file_content.text: No! This is not right! You were supposed to die!
If I can't have my isotope-5, no one can! Prepare to face the Void with me, you thieving filth!
A single drop of isotope-5 could level this palace! I just set fire to a whole lake of it! Prepare for flaming death!
You left us no chance to get you out of here alive, Toborro. Goodbye.
I'm sorry I can't save you.
You'll never make it!
Oh, no, you don't. Nobody kills you but me!
Die, you Hutt. [Kill Toborro]
Welcome to your doom, vermin! Have no illusions about your fate. I planned for every contingency. You are no match for my unsurpassed brilliance.
You destroyed this world, enslaved and murdered people--and for what? Vanity. You're done, Toborro--surrender.
Now you will face justice.
Arrogant scum! No one speaks to me like that in my domain!
A Jedi only seeks confrontation when there's no other recourse. You've had plenty of time to be reasonable. This is your last chance, Toborro.
I am no thief.
You should not have come here if you wanted to live, foolish little Jedi!
Please tell me you're not going to cry. All's fair in war--didn't anyone ever tell you that?
Quit pouting and be a Hutt.
I live by those words! See for yourself!
You know what they say, Toborro: Possession is everything. If you can't keep it, you don't deserve to have it.
Finders keepers, fat boy.
I could say the same about your life!
This planet may not be around much longer, but its people will always be part of the Republic.
The people are what matter.
You mean those people who are all going to die? I hope you enjoy digging graves!
I hope you've enjoyed your reign over the Cartel--because it's ending right now. Any last words, Hutt?
Time to die, Toborro.
I will have the final say! Not you!
Behold my ultimate isotope-5 droid. I call it "Toborro's Glittering Fury"!
You want your precious fuel rods? Take them from my guardian--if you can!
Filthy little mongrels! How dare you invade my glorious palace!
What am I paying you mercenaries for? Kill the intruders!
You will die--even if I must kill you myself!
What fools you are, fighting for a planet that isn't even part of your pitiful Republic. For all your struggles, you will gain nothing!
This world became part of the Republic the moment we landed here. You're the one wasting time, Toborro.
Makeb has joined the Republic.
All your friends just surrendered to us. At this rate, Hutta will be a Republic world by next week. Enjoy the irony.
We'll take over the Cartel.
Idiot! I am the only one who will ever benefit from this planet's bounty! Isotope-5 will make me more powerful than the Architects!
Spare me your pathetic posturing! It's truly embarrassing!
You are nothing but dirty little thieves, come to steal what is rightfully mine! But you will never have it!
How do you plan to kill me, Toborro? Your awful breath, or rolling over?
You plan to fight me yourself?
I would never touch scum like you!
Destroy them, my Glittering Fury!
I'll decorate my walls with your hides!
Blast you to the Void, Republic scum!
